lead_paragraph: Camille Cosby will not have to sit for a deposition Wednesday in a lawsuit filed against her husband, Bill Cosby, a federal judge in Massachusetts ruled.
snippet: Camille Cosby will not have to sit for a deposition Wednesday in a lawsuit filed against her husband, Bill Cosby, a federal judge in Massachusetts ruled.
abstract: Judge David H Hennessy of Massachusetts rules Camille Cosby will not have to sit for deposition in lawsuit filed against her husband, Bill Cosby, until her lawyers have chance to appeal case.
